patterns: how much leave do I get
responses:
**Annual Leave Policy:**
- Full-time employees: 21 days per year
- Part-time employees: Pro-rated based on hours
- Sick leave: 10 days per year
- Personal days: 3 days per year

Leave requests should be submitted at least 2 weeks in advance through the HR portal.

**To request leave:**
1. Go to HR Portal > Leave Management
2. Click 'New Leave Request'
3. Select leave type and dates
4. Add reason and submit
5. Your manager will receive notification for approval

Note: Requests need manager approval within 48 hours.

**Payroll Schedule:**
- Salary is paid on the 25th of each month
- If 25th falls on weekend/holiday, payment is made on the previous working day
- Payslips are available on HR Portal 2 days before payday

For payroll queries, contact HR at hr@hotel.com

**Employee Benefits:**
- Health Insurance: Full coverage for employee + 50% for dependents
- Dental & Vision: Included in health plan
- Life Insurance: 2x annual salary
- Meal allowance: Complimentary staff cafeteria
- Gym membership: 50% discount at partner gyms
- Hotel discounts: 70% off at sister properties
- Training & Development: Annual budget of $500

**Staff WiFi Access:**
- Network: HOTEL_STAFF
- Password: Staff2024Secure!

**Guest WiFi:**
- Network: HOTEL_GUEST
- Password: Welcome2Hotel

For connectivity issues, contact IT at ext. 4444

**IT Support:**
- Phone: Extension 4444
- Email: it.support@hotel.com
- Ticket System: IT Portal on intranet
- Hours: 24/7 for critical issues

**Common Issues:**
- Password reset: Use 'Forgot Password' or call IT
- Software installation: Submit IT ticket
- Hardware issues: Visit IT office (Room B-102)

**Emergency Contacts:**
- Security: Extension 9999 (24/7)
- Medical Emergency: Extension 9911
- Fire Emergency: Extension 9119
- General Emergency: Dial 0 for operator

**Emergency Procedures:**
1. Stay calm and assess the situation
2. Call appropriate emergency extension
3. Follow evacuation routes if needed
4. Assembly point: Main parking lot

**Dress Code Policy:**

**Front Office & Guest-Facing:**
- Provided uniform must be worn
- Name badge required at all times
- Closed-toe shoes only

**Back Office:**
- Business casual attire
- No jeans on weekdays
- Casual Fridays allowed

**Housekeeping & Maintenance:**
- Department-issued uniform required
- Safety shoes mandatory

**Standard Working Hours:**
- Day Shift: 7:00 AM - 3:00 PM
- Evening Shift: 3:00 PM - 11:00 PM
- Night Shift: 11:00 PM - 7:00 AM

**Office Staff:**
- Monday-Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- Lunch break: 1 hour

Shift schedules are posted weekly on the Staff Portal.

**Staff Parking:**
- Location: Basement Level B2 & B3
- Access: Use your employee ID card
- Spaces: First-come, first-served
- Reserved spots: Department heads only

**Rules:**
- Park in designated staff areas only
- Display parking permit on dashboard
- Report any incidents to Security

**Staff Cafeteria:**
- Location: Ground Floor, West Wing
- Hours: 6:00 AM - 10:00 PM

**Meal Times:**
- Breakfast: 6:00 AM - 10:00 AM
- Lunch: 11:30 AM - 2:30 PM
- Dinner: 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM

**Cost:** Free for all employees (meal allowance benefit)

**Training & Development:**

**Available Programs:**
- Online courses via Learning Portal
- Monthly workshops
- Cross-training opportunities
- Leadership development program

**How to Enroll:**
1. Visit Learning Portal on intranet
2. Browse available courses
3. Request enrollment
4. Get manager approval

Annual training budget: $500 per employee

**Reporting Workplace Issues:**

**Options:**
1. Speak with your direct supervisor
2. Contact HR directly (confidential)
3. Use anonymous hotline: 1-800-HOTEL-HR
4. Submit via HR Portal > Grievance Form

**HR Contact:**
- Email: hr.confidential@hotel.com
- Office: Admin Building, Room 205
- All reports are handled confidentially

**Employee Room Discounts:**
- 70% off Best Available Rate at our property
- 50% off at sister properties worldwide
- Subject to availability
- Blackout dates apply during peak seasons

**How to Book:**
1. Use Employee Travel Portal
2. Select dates and property
3. Discount applied automatically
4. Maximum 10 nights per year

**Lost & Found:**
- Location: Security Office, Ground Floor
- Hours: 24/7
- Phone: Extension 5555

**Procedure:**
- Found items: Bring to Security immediately
- Lost items: Report to Security with description
- Items kept for 90 days
- Valuable items stored in safe

**Handling Guest Complaints:**

**LEARN Method:**
- **L**isten actively to the guest
- **E**mpathize with their situation
- **A**pologize sincerely
- **R**esolve the issue promptly
- **N**otify supervisor if needed

**Escalation:**
- Minor issues: Resolve immediately
- Major issues: Contact Duty Manager (ext. 1000)
- Compensation authority: Check with supervisor

**Guest Check-In Procedure:**

1. Greet guest warmly
2. Verify reservation in PMS
3. Request ID and credit card
4. Confirm room type and rate
5. Explain hotel amenities
6. Provide key cards and WiFi info
7. Offer assistance with luggage
8. Wish pleasant stay

**Check-in time:** 3:00 PM
**Early check-in:** Subject to availability

**Guest Check-Out Procedure:**

1. Greet guest and ask about stay
2. Review folio for accuracy
3. Process any pending charges
4. Present final bill
5. Process payment
6. Collect key cards
7. Offer receipt via email/print
8. Thank guest and invite return

**Check-out time:** 12:00 PM
**Late check-out:** Request approval from FOM

**Housekeeping Information:**

**Contact:** Extension 3333

**Standard Schedule:**
- Stayover rooms: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM
- Checkout rooms: Priority cleaning
- Turn-down service: 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM

**Requests:**
- Extra towels/amenities: Call ext. 3333
- DND rooms: Check after 2:00 PM
- Rush cleaning: Notify supervisor

**Maintenance/Engineering:**

**Contact:** Extension 2222
**Email:** maintenance@hotel.com

**How to Report:**
1. Log into Maintenance Portal
2. Submit work order with details
3. Specify urgency level
4. Track status online

**Emergency Repairs:**
- Call ext. 2222 directly
- Available 24/7 for urgent issues

**VIP Guest Protocol:**

**Pre-Arrival:**
- Review VIP report daily
- Prepare welcome amenities
- Pre-assign best available room
- Brief all departments

**Arrival:**
- GM/Duty Manager to greet
- Express check-in at room
- Personalized welcome letter
- Complimentary upgrade if available

**During Stay:**
- Priority service from all departments
- Daily follow-up by Guest Relations

**Phone Etiquette:**

**Answering:**
"Good [morning/afternoon/evening], [Department], this is [Name], how may I assist you?"

**Guidelines:**
- Answer within 3 rings
- Smile while speaking
- Speak clearly and professionally
- Use guest's name when known
- Never put on hold without permission
- Transfer calls properly with introduction

**Meeting Room Booking:**

**Available Rooms:**
- Boardroom (20 pax) - 3rd Floor
- Conference Room A (10 pax) - 2nd Floor
- Conference Room B (8 pax) - 2nd Floor
- Training Room (30 pax) - Ground Floor

**How to Book:**
1. Go to Intranet > Room Booking
2. Select date, time, and room
3. Add attendees and requirements
4. Submit for approval

**Overtime Policy:**

**Eligibility:**
- Non-exempt employees only
- Must be pre-approved by supervisor

**Rates:**
- Weekdays: 1.5x hourly rate
- Weekends: 2x hourly rate
- Public holidays: 2.5x hourly rate

**Process:**
1. Get supervisor approval before OT
2. Log hours in time system
3. Supervisor approves timesheet
4. Paid in next payroll cycle

**Resignation Process:**

**Notice Period:**
- Staff: 2 weeks
- Supervisors: 4 weeks
- Managers: 8 weeks

**Steps:**
1. Submit written resignation to supervisor
2. HR will schedule exit interview
3. Complete handover documentation
4. Return company property
5. Final settlement within 30 days

Contact HR for resignation letter template.

**Career Advancement:**

**Promotion Criteria:**
- Minimum 1 year in current role
- Consistent performance ratings
- Required certifications completed
- Leadership potential demonstrated

**Process:**
1. Discuss with supervisor
2. Apply for internal openings
3. Complete assessment
4. Interview with hiring manager

Check Internal Job Board weekly for opportunities!

**Performance Review:**

**Schedule:**
- Annual review: December
- Mid-year check-in: June
- Probation review: End of probation

**Process:**
1. Self-assessment submission
2. Manager evaluation
3. One-on-one discussion
4. Goal setting for next period
5. Sign-off and HR filing

Access review forms on HR Portal.

**Internal Ticket System:**

**How to Submit:**
1. Go to Intranet > Tickets
2. Click 'New Ticket'
3. Select department and category
4. Describe issue in detail
5. Attach files if needed
6. Submit and track status

**Response Times:**
- Critical: 1 hour
- High: 4 hours
- Medium: 24 hours
- Low: 48 hours

**Staff Directory:**

Access the full staff directory on the Intranet:
1. Go to Intranet > Staff List
2. Search by name or department
3. View contact details and extension

**Key Contacts:**
- Front Desk: ext. 0
- HR: ext. 1111
- IT: ext. 4444
- Security: ext. 9999
- Maintenance: ext. 2222

**Stay Updated:**

**Where to Find Announcements:**
- Dashboard: Check 'Announcements' section
- Email: Weekly newsletter every Monday
- Notice boards: Staff areas
- Town halls: Monthly all-hands meeting

Make sure to check the dashboard daily for important updates!
